experience: You and Mat both know Keith Teare, Kyle Burnett, and 230 others
One of the most frequent questions I get here is what to do with bitcoin.

As someone survived the post USSR decade, called "The Wild Nineties", I witnessed the rise of hundreds of financial pyramids. The most famous of them, "MMM",  one of the World's largest Ponzi schemes of all time, made from 5 to 10 million people lost their savings (for many the loss included homes and other property). There were many other pyramids, so almost a half of Russian population were affected.

The cost of bitcoin will grow while there is room for growth. The growth is fuelled by new investors who want to benefit from the growth. They have to pay more money to buy bitcoins (their quantity is limited) and the cost of the latter goes up. Once media reach everyone reachable, new investors will stop coming, the growth will start slowing down. And then, everyone will try to sell, which will result in a massive bitcoin devaluation. That's how pyramids work.
If you are lucky you will sell at the right moment. But because bitcoin is global, the devaluation can happen very quickly while you sleep.
Just another day inside my head.

Gary Vaynerchuk has helped me realized that no one works for "the boss". When you're the boss, you work for everyone else. It's all about that servant leadership. I'm excited to have employees of my own.

We get our customers more organic traffic which leads to more sales. Need blog content for sales and marketing collateral? Done. Need that blog content to rank well on Google. Well, that's what we do and we do it well. As you plan your event, you will need an audiovisual & event production company to help you handle everything from staging, sound, lighting and more. Endless Entertainment is there to be your technical scientist and hand all of your production needs. With our massive warehouse of equipment and team of specialists, we can take care of it all.

I am the President of the student board at Arizona State Hillel Jewish Student Center. I am the point of contact for all issues related to Hillel and I head higher level discussions and projects. I work to establish relationships with other organizations on campus and off campus as well as managing large scale events with other organizations.

Take at least 150 quality pictures every day to post on the Camp's website. I also oversee two other photographers who spend half their day walking around and taking pictures. I also am responsible for make all camp videos including the two end of the session promotional videos. I also lead two week long programs all about film to teach to the kids so they can bring back those skills.
Film all the practices of the ASU Cheer team and created promotional videos for them. I also travel to competitions with them filming competitions and life on the road.

Mat is one of the most dedicated, hard-working, and charismatic individuals that I know. He always puts 110% effort into everything he does, and he is always upbeat and outgoing. As President of Hillel at ASU so far, he has implemented many successful social media marketing campaigns, event planning strategies, and impacted Hillel's structure in a very positive way. Mat is one of the very few who could truly be considered a leader; he is encouraging, intelligent, emotionally intellectual, and his marketing skills are fantastic. I would recommend Mat for any and every job; he is extremely versatile!
